Lagos State Model College Igbonla bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke steeti dị na mpaghara Epe nke Lagos Steeti
E hiwere ya n'afọ 1988, ya na kọleji anọ ndị ọzọ n'okpuru nchịkwa ndị agha nke Captain Okhai Mike Akhigbe, Gọvanọ ndị agha nke steeti Lagos n'oge ahụ
Kọleji nke e guzobere ya na mmadụ anọ ndị ọzọ malitere na Government College, Ketu, Epe
Kọleji anọ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Kankon, Badore, Meiran na Igbokuta
Site n'oge 1988 ruo 1992, e nyere kọleji ntọala dị mkpa ma lekwasị anya na ọrụ ha dị ka ndị na-aga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ na mbọ ndị ọzọ

Ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ na Model College Igbonla meriri laurels na mmemme site na Directorate of Food Roads and Rural Infrastructure (DFRRI), All Nigeria Confederation of Principals of Secondary Schools (ANCOPSS) na ọtụtụ asọmpi ndị ọzọ
[citation needed] Dịka ọmụmaatụ, nwa akwụkwọ si na College meriri ANCOPSS National Essay Competition na 1992
Onye isi ntọala maka Igbonla, Maazị James Akinola Paseda, bụkwa onye isi nhazi maka kọleji ise ahụ na mbido na Febụwarị afọ 1988
Onye isi oche nke ntọala ahụ bụ Mrs
Kọleji Igbonla a malitere ebe a na Igbonla na Disemba 1989
N'afọ 2003, n'oge Senator Bola Tinubu dị ka Gọvanọ, Lagos State Model College, e kewara Igbonla n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ Junior na Senior na nke ọ bụla na-anọgide na-enwe ọnọdụ onwe ya
Ụlọ akwụkwọ Junior meghere na Mọnde, Jenụwarị 6, 2003
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ dị n'ime obodo, Igbonla na mpụga Epe n'okporo ụzọ Ijebu Ode.
E guzobere ngalaba nke obere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na 2003, mgbe nkewa nchịkwa nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lagos Steeti.
E guzobere ngalaba Senior nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ n'afọ 1988 ma kewapụ ya na Junior School n'afọ 2003 mgbe nkewa nchịkwa nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lagos Steeti.
